short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with waifus, idols, and images of your choice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block unwanted sites, motivate yourself, and boost productivity with anime waifus!

Many other site-blocking extensions charge steep subscriptions for use, and others can be turned off with just a click.

With Waifu Focus, you won't WANT to uninstall the extension, because that would mean being unable to see your waifus, thus boosting your productivity!

(Images are not mine, credit goes to the original artists)

As of 7/25/2024, Kpop support is added! Groups currently included are: BTS, Twice, Aespa, ILLIT, TXT, and Le Sserafim.

[still in beta]
